scripts.build:ts: cd libraries/ts && npm run tsc && tsc
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint && git add .
scripts.mod: npm run mod:init && npm run mod:install && npm run mod:link && npm run mod:compile && npm run mod:test
scripts.mod:install: cd libraries/ts && yarn && cd ../.. && git submodule foreach npm i
scripts.mod:link: cd libraries/ts && npm link && cd ../.. && git submodule foreach npm link @jet-lab/margin
scripts.mod:compile: cd libraries/ts && yarn && yarn compile && cd ../../deps/jet-app && npm run compile && cd ../jet-monitoring-service && npm run build
